about_the_game:
Dead Hope is an open world loot shooter inspired from games like 'The WarZ' and 'The Division'


There are two differente gamemodes to play

SURVIVAL MODE:
The survival mode can be played alone in single player or with friends in co-op. In this mode you will fight against the post-apocalypse, building a settlement and trying to survive against the zombies and from the nature itself.

ONLINE MODE:
In the online mode, you also try to survive against the post-apocalypse, but the biggest enemie wont be the zombies or the nature, it will be the fight for ressoruces against other survivors. The main target of the online mode is to replenish your global stock of items, so you are ready for battles against other players or for faction wars to show who is the best survival squad. With faction leagues, weekly events and much more.

content_descriptors.notes:
Dead Hope is a zombie survival game, with two difference modes. 
The maps in both modes are equal but have difference aims.
Mode one is a survival game in a offline or co-op mode, with base building, looting, farming, missions and more.
Mode two is a online game on dedicated servers where you can group up with your friends or strangers and build up the biggest clan in the postapocalypse by fighting against they other clans to be the number one.

Our main focus in Dead Hope is the online game where weekly events are plant.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD® A8 3870 3,6 Ghz or Intel® Core ™ i3 2100 3.1Ghz or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 465 / ATI Radeon TM HD 6870.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Card.

short_description: Dead Hope is an open world zombie loot shooter with a survival game mode playable in single player or in co-op with friends. There is also an online extraction mode inspired by games like The WarZ, The Division, Escape from Tarkov and Hunt Showdown.
